defects.title: Start working on the project!
defects.description: This is the first ticket to get it all started. I better get to work!

defects.title: Display defects on DefectsShow
defects.description: Render a list of all current defects on the DefectsShow page

defects.title: Make the header and sidebar presentable
defects.description: Format the search bar in the header and clean it up a little bit. Maybe add a logo so it doesn't look so empty.

defects.title: Actions, Reducers, and Postman
defects.description: Finish up some basic actions and reducers and create a ticket using Postman

defects.title: Create a defect page isn't working
defects.description: I will now begin formatting tickets as actual issues that need to be fixed. New Defect page is blank. There is currently no way to create a defect using the page. Input forms need to be created. They need to be connected to the redux store using redux forms. The page needs some basic HTML and CSS to look presentable. Creating tickets using this page should should be functional before this ticket is completed.

defects.title: Can't create bugs using the bug tracker
defects.description: This is my first bug submitted using the tracker itself. If this works successfully I will use the edit form to edit the issue into a resolved state.

defects.title: The bug tracker needs authentication
defects.description: Add authentication to the defect tracker. This will extend to Administrators, devs, users, and finally guests all having different log ins, data that is stored, screens displayed, and permissions.
